PART I
Acts, Ordinances, President’s Orders and Regulations
GOVERNMENT OF GILGIT-BALTISTAN
GILGIT-BALTISTAN SECRETARIAT
(Law and Prosecution Department)
Gilgit, the 14th September, 2019
Gilgit-Baltistan Service Tribunal (Amendment) Ordinance 2019
O
RDINANCE
 N
O
. 1 
OF
 2019
AN
A
CT
Further to amend the Gilgit-Baltistan Service Tribunal Act, 2014
(Act No. 1 of 2014)
ALA-1(1)/2019/GBLA.—
P
REAMBLE WHEREAS
 it is expedient further to
amend the Service Tribunal Amend. Act 2014 to remove the ambiguity and for the
purpose herein after appearing.
(419)
Price : Rs. 5.00
[1532 (2019)/Ex. Gaz.]
420
THE  GAZETTE  OF  PAKISTAN,  EXTRA.,  OCTOBER  3,  2019
 [P
AR
T
 I
It is enacted as follows:
1.
Short title and commencement
.—(1) This Ordinance may be called
the Gilgit-Baltistan Service Tribunal (Amendment) Ordinance No. 1 of 2019.
(2)
It shall come into force at once.
(3)
It extends to the whole of Gilgit Baltistan.
2.
Substitution of sub Section No. 3 of Section 3 of the Service
Tribunal Act 2014. In sub section 3 of section 3 the following shall be
substituted namely—
“A person who incase of lawyer shall have at least eight years experience
in the legal field or as an advocate enrolment in GB Chief Court or
Civil Service in any Government department can be eligible for
appointment as Member/Chairman of GB Service Tribunal”.
RAJA JALAL,
Governor
Gilgit-Baltistan .
